actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1508.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 11733 to authorize appropriations for the construction of certain highways in accordance with title 23 of the United States Code, for highway safety, for mass transportation in urban and in rural areas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 11733 (highway safety, mass transportation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 11733 to authorize appropriations for the construction of certain highways in accordance with title 23 of the United States Code, for highway safety, for mass transportation in urban and in rural areas, and for other purposes.
